name: Radisson Blu Hotel, East Midlands Airport

reviews.text: Just stayed 1 night prior to an early morning flight. Brand new, sparkling hotel, easy to get to and lovely rooms.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay

reviews.text: It was very quiet the night we stayed but the hotel has not been open long. Staff were fantastic, restaurant not overly expensive and bar service good. We'd booked the Park and Fly package and this is well worth the money.
reviews.title: wow! At last, a great hotel at East Midlands Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will stay here again in future as opposed to the other hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Best in the area - by far.

aka: Radisson Blu Hotel, East Midlands Airport Hotel
description: ***LUXURIOUS NEW RADISSON BLU HOTEL - EAST MIDLANDS AIRPORT****** NOW OPEN!! Offering easy access to East Midlands Airport the new Radisson Blu Hotel is an excellent base for the discerning traveller. Stylish rooms and a first-class conference centre are offered alongside extensive dining options and excellent leisure facilities making it the preferred place to stay for business and leisure guests alike. Rooms: The hotel’s 218 contemporary guest rooms are tastefully and stylishly designed with luxury and comfort in mind. With a selection of standard rooms, business class rooms and suites attention to detail is evident throughout. All rooms feature air conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities along with 38 inch flat screen televisions and free high speed internet access. Business class rooms and Suites feature extra amenities such as Nespresso® coffee machines and free movies. Dining: With an extensive brasserie style menu providing international cuisine choice will be paramount. Guests will be offered a variety of dishes and can choose to dine in the restaurant, lounge or bar. The Radisson Blu East Midlands Airport considers breakfast to be the most important meal of the day and offers a Super Breakfast concept which includes a large range of continental and English options to satisfy all tastes. Meetings & Events: Combining state of the art meeting facilities with an excellent convenient location for business travellers or local businesses the Radisson Blu East Midlands Airport is already a sought after conference venue. Ideal for hosting events ranging from international conferences to intimate banquets the hotel’s 9 flexible meeting rooms can cater for 400 delegates in the largest suite. Services: Guests can enjoy the facilities of the onsite gym with all the latest high tech equipment. The swimming pool and spa area will provide relaxation after a hectic day. Free High speed internet access will be available throughout the hotel, outdoor parking, 24 hour room service and guest laundry service. Location: Offering prime location minutes from East Midlands Airport the Radisson Blu Hotel is in the heart of the East Midlands. The nearby M1 and M42 Motorways create easy access to local cities such as Derby, Nottingham and Leicester.
